dct_title_s: Mongolia scale 1:1,800,000 : Ulaanbaatar, waterproof / ITMB ; edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Beatrice Montredon, Tran Dinh Cuong ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Title from panel. Maps shows international and province boundaries, five classes of roads, railways, tracks and paths, border crossings, places of worship, mines, and tourist attractions including world heritage sites. Ancillary map on recto: Major biomes of Mongolia.
dct_publisher_sm: Richmond, BC, Canada : ITMB Publishing Ltd., 2017.
